multimonster.common.media
Class MetaDataAccess

java.lang.Object
  multimonster.common.media.MetaDataAccess
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMetaData, IMetaDataReader, IMetaDataWriter, java.io.Serializable
public class MetaDataAccess
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMetaData

A MetaDataAccess is concrete implementation of the IMetaData interface. It combines IMetaData interfaces. In Order to add a new MetaDataProperty to this class simply add a private static field like : private static Object[] titleProperty = new Object[] { "Title", String.class }; to this class . A Reflection based algorithm checks all fiels in an static initializer. Therefor the property is available in the getKeys() and getValueTypes() methods;

Author:
Frank Müller
See Also:
